name: Hop King
description:
The WebPlayer version might not work on some browsers. I found my Firefox was messing up. But Edge and Chrome worked perfectly.

You play as a Frog, you must hop to find a Mate. There is only so much time that Frog Bae feels like getting Froggy. So make haste. Every motion counts. The timer only ticks, when you move.  

 There is only THREE LEVELS. The final level you get to spend what little time you have left next to the cute Frog Bae. So enjoy that. Then alt+f4. lol.

This was made in Corgi Engine(for unity) I've been wanting to learn the Package a lot so this game jam helped a ton with that.

A few issues still. Mostly with audio. So if you have issues with ODDio then just mute it in mixer. I worked to the last minute with this. I learned a lot from this. Messed up on some things during level transition. But it's playable and Im happy as a Frog on a log.
